short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows Baton App to control Google Slides presentations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Baton App for Slides extension allows users of Baton to extend its functionality to Google Slides. By installing this simple extension, you can share control of your Google Slides presentations with co-presenters.
